HealthCheck.description: The health check command and associated configuration parameters for the container.

Command.description: A string array representing the command that the container runs to determine if it is healthy.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Command.markdownDescription:
A string array representing the command that the container runs to determine if it is healthy.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Interval.description: The time period in seconds between each health check execution. You may specify between 5 and 300 seconds. The default value is 30 seconds.
Interval.markdownDescription:
The time period in seconds between each health check execution. You may specify between 5 and 300 seconds. The default value is 30 seconds.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Timeout.description: The time period in seconds to wait for a health check to succeed before it is considered a failure. You may specify between 2 and 60 seconds. The default value is 5 seconds.
Timeout.markdownDescription:
The time period in seconds to wait for a health check to succeed before it is considered a failure. You may specify between 2 and 60 seconds. The default value is 5 seconds.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Retries.description: The number of times to retry a failed health check before the container is considered unhealthy. You may specify between 1 and 10 retries. The default value is three retries.
Retries.markdownDescription:
The number of times to retry a failed health check before the container is considered unhealthy. You may specify between 1 and 10 retries. The default value is three retries.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

StartPeriod.description: The optional grace period within which to provide containers time to bootstrap before failed health checks count towards the maximum number of retries. You may specify between 0 and 300 seconds. The startPeriod is disabled by default.
StartPeriod.markdownDescription:
The optional grace period within which to provide containers time to bootstrap before failed health checks count towards the maximum number of retries. You may specify between 0 and 300 seconds. The startPeriod is disabled by default.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

HealthCheck.markdownDescription:
The health check command and associated configuration parameters for the container.

Update requires: No interruption
